name: PT Nara Putra Teknologi
description: Developer of a property tech platform designed to buy, sell and rent houses in cheap rates. The company's platform offers support services of a professional property agent through the mobile application where agents are able to share information, listings and sales, enabling property agents to revolutionize and change the way market properties communicate with each other.
one_liner: Developer of a property tech platform designed to buy, sell and rent houses in cheap rates. The company's platform offers support services of a professional property agent through the mobile application where agents are able to share information, listings and sales, enabling property agents to revolutionize and change the way market properties communicate with each other.
